column4: Anyone here got RTCW or ET working on 11.04 _with_ perfect sound?
what is RTCW and what is ET ?
if you had them you'd know :P but they're games.
please don't initialise non-standard things, it makes support near  impossible
I'll initialise what I like
if they are windows games, did you check the appdb?
please stop trying to help now and give someone else a chance

fine, but nobody will have any idea what you are talking about, needing then for further clarification. You choice.  You can give full details and GET support, or initialize "what you like" and get nowhere. Your choice
essentially, check the appdb for wine
it is, well done, good bye
and that just proves you have no idea, these are not windows games
done yet?
if you give what they ACTUALLY are, we can help
if you had either game you'd be able to help - otherwise you can not... It is just that simple.  And if you had those games you'd know what RTCW and ET is.
fine, struggle away. If you want help then please give details. I doubt anyone will give any help as you aren't being co-operative. I have asked nicely.
And I have asked equally as nicely for you to simply dtop it
you got it
if you get no answer and want to enlighten me, I'm ready to help
you can set the default in /etc/default/grub  but you will need to chroot to change it back again so you can boot the OS (messy) do you not have a USB keyboard handy?
no i don't have any other keybs at the moment
its doable, just messy
well I know I can chroot from any old livecd/usb - (not the first time I've done that) - but was after something simpler
